item.title: Cirriculum Vitae
item.description: Cirriculum Vitae Download my complete curriculum vitae here. Current Academic Appointment 2020 - present, Wieler Family Assistant Professor of Economics in the Morrissey College of Arts and Sciences, Boston College, Chestnut Hill, MA USA Previous Employment 2020 - 2023, Wieler Family Assistant Professor of Economics in the Morrissey College of Arts and Sciences, Boston College, Chestnut Hill, MA USA 2018 - 2023, Assistant Professor of Economics, Boston College, Chestnut Hill, MA USA

item.title: Research
item.description: Publications and Accepted Manuscripts Price Discrimination in International Airline Markets (with Gaurab Aryal and Jonathan W. Williams) Forthcoming at Review of Economic Studies, 2023. Franchise Contract Regulations and Local Market Structure (with Peter Newberry) The Journal of Law and Economics, 65, no. 1 (2022): 105-130. Market Structure and Competition in Airline Markets (with Federico Ciliberto and Elie Tamer) Journal of Political Economy vol. 129, no.
